Content.Title: Use
Text: You can use the maze creator to create any files you want and the files created are your property, you have full rights to those files. Though you may NOT redistribute or edit the maze creator program itself!

Content.Title: Reading Files
Text: .maz files are just binary files with the following variables in order. First two Int32 of width then height of the maze. Then two more Int32 of the entrance's X and Y position. The two more Int32 of the exit's X and Y position. The rest of the file is booleans of if there is a floor at the current tile or not where the current tile is x*height+y.
